title: Fake Subpage (or Section) for Areas of Expertise in an Ontology Subsection or Single Profile

fields.label: General Placement
General Title of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Areas of Expertise
fields.name: expertise_fpage_title_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., title of a fake subpage (or section) for descendant areas of expertise in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Intro Text of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Areas of Expertise
fields.name: expertise_fpage_intro_general
fields.instructions:
If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used

This value may be overridden by inputs specific to the text element's placement (e.g., intro text of a fake subpage (or section) for descendant areas of expertise in an area of expertise subsection).

fields.label: General Featured Image of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Areas of Expertise
fields.name: expertise_fpage_featured_image_general
fields.instructions:
Recommended dimensions: 2560x1920 or larger. Minimum dimensions: 1280x720.

The image will be automatically cropped to a 16:9 aspect ratio when used on the site; 1.91:1 aspect ratio when sharing to Facebook and Twitter.

fields.label: Location Subsection
Title of Fake Subpage (or Section) for Areas of Expertise in Location Subsection
fields.name: expertise_fpage_title_location
fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default title structure will be used.
fields.placeholder: [Areas of Expertise] Represented at [the Location Title]

fields.instructions: If you leave this blank, the default intro text structure will be used.
